snippet.title: Badlands
snippet.description: Assigned to protect Penny’s father, a presidential candidate, Owen can’t get emotionally involved. That is, until Penny and her young son, Cruz, are abducted and taken deep into the California badlands.

snippet.title: Seven Versions of an Australian Badland
snippet.description: Part road movie, part memoir, part murder mystery, Seven Versions of an Australian Badland embarks on an enthralling journey through time, into the realms of myth and magic, narcissism and genocide.

snippet.title: Learning Cocos2D: A Hands-On Guide to Building iOS Games ...
snippet.description: Learning Cocos2D walks you through the process of building Space Viking (which is free on the App Store), a 2D scrolling game that leverages Cocos2D, Box2D, and Chipmunk.

snippet.title: Bad Land: An American Romance
snippet.description: Raban's stunning evocation of the harrowing, desperate reality behind the homesteader's dream strips away the myth--while preserving the romance--that has shrouded our understanding of our own heartland. From the Hardcover edition.

snippet.title: The Badlands: More Stories from Midnight in Peking (A ...
snippet.description: As the book was published in China, Australia, America, and the UK, the families and acquaintances of the people he had written about contacted him from around the globe, adding stories and recollections to his own research.

snippet.title: Backpacker - Mar 2003 - Page 13

snippet.title: Barbarian Beast Bitches of the Badlands

snippet.title: Eat, Sleep, Ride: How I Braved Bears, Badlands, and Big ...
snippet.description: But, although there may only be a dozen or so participants, this isn't just any mountain-bike race. This is the Tour Divide.
